summary: This bill, S. 1353, introduced by Senator Murkowski, aims to extend the authority for modifications to the Second Division Memorial in Washington, D.C. The bill specifically extends the applicability of Section 352 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2018, allowing for continued modifications to the memorial through September 30, 2032. The bill cites Title 40, United States Code, and references Public Law 115-91.
